1484252081187917827.text:
Three Wednesdays in January, 2021:
▪️January 6th attack
▪️Impeachment proceedings, over which I presided

(4/8)

1410706266822000643.text: As Vice Chair, I'm proud of the FY22 Interior-Environment funding bill led by @chelliepingree & advanced by @AppropsDems today. 1410682537677053954.text: This provision will not impact current mines or jobs – including those in the taconite industry – despite false claims from some other Members of Congress. The only effect is a 1-year pause on the mine plan proposed by Twin Metals, for leases currently being challenged in court.

1410682536804634630.text: My provision allows time for the Biden administration time to restart and complete a critically important environmental assessment of the impact of mining in this watershed– a study that was abandoned & its results never released by the last administration. #SaveTheseWaters
